name: Family Digest
description: Draft a daily digest based on calendar + tasks. Stops before sending.
prompt:
Daily digest workflow.

Goal
- Draft a clear digest message for visibility (calendar + tasks).

Inputs
- Range: {{range}}
- Recipient description (who this is for): {{recipient}}
- Tone: {{tone}}

Steps
1) Collect calendar events for the chosen range ("{{range}}").
   - Use apple_calendar_action if available; otherwise use google_calendar_action.
2) Collect task/reminder signals:
   - Use apple_reminders_action if available.
   - Also list relevant scheduled tasks (schedule_task list) if any.
3) Draft a digest message in tone "{{tone}}" aimed at "{{recipient}}".
   - Keep it short, scannable, and specific times.
4) STOP BEFORE SENDING. Ask me to confirm the message and where to send it.

parameters.name: recipient
parameters.description: Who this digest is for (e.g., "my parents", "my partner")
